data.title: EA Stock Price, Company Overview & News
data.meta_description: Electronic Arts, Inc. engages in the provision of digital interactive entertainment. It develops and delivers games, content, and online services for Internet-connected
data.text:
Jasmine Paolini’s Golden Year Of Tennis Is Yielding More Than Medals

At 28, many tennis players are already contemplating retirement. But in a season in which she triumphed at the Olympics and made two appearances in Grand Slam finals, Italy’s petite powerhouse is just getting warmed up.

Love And Money: Why The Girlfriends Of Top Tennis Players Are Making Millions

Paige Lorenze, Morgan Riddle, Ayan Broomfield and others dating tennis pros are signing up as many sponsorship deals as their romantic doubles partners. Inside the lucrative racket that advertisers can’t resist.

$75 Million In Prize Money, More Than $500 Million In Revenue: The 2024 U.S. Open By The Numbers

Here are 17 figures to know about the world’s biggest tennis tournament, from the annual attendance to the betting odds for the favorites to the number of signature cocktails sold.

The World’s Highest-Paid Tennis Players 2024

Browse the 10 top-earning tennis players, including Novak Djokovic, Carlos Alcaraz and Coco Gauff, and learn more about their eye-popping prize money and endorsement income.

FC Barcelona Star’s Unexpected Training Absence Fuels Talk Of Sale

The unexpected absence of an FC Barcelona first team star from training has fueled talk that he could be sold in the coming days.

Sabrina Carpenter’s ‘Short n’ Sweet’ New Album Has Arrived

Sabrina Carpenter's long-awaited album 'Short n' Sweet' is here after a summer of smash hits with 'Espresso' and 'Please Please Please.'

Real Madrid Officially Announces Transfer

Real Madrid has announced a player transfer through a statement published on its official website and shared via social media.

Harris Surges Past Trump Again In Election Betting Markets As DNC Wraps Up

Trump had nudged past Harris earlier this week on the reports of independent candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. dropping out of the race.

Alibaba Changes Hong Kong Listing Status To Primary To Tap Chinese Investors

The move paves the way for Alibaba to join Hong Kong’s Stock Connect scheme.

Sanctions Should Reward Those Who Comply In Difficult Conditions

The West should publicly recognize and help commercial entities that heroically abide by sanctions against all the odds in places like Kyrgyzstan like Bakai Bank

Abortion Is Not “An Issue That Leans Toward Us”: Trump Tells Newsmax After Harris DNC Speech

In her speech at the Democratic National Convention Vice President Kamala Harris said Trump handpicked Supreme Court Justices to “take away reproductive freedom, and now he brags about it.”

Harris Said 'I' 83 Times In Convention Speech Compared To Trump’s 262—But Trump's Speech Was Far Longer

Bill Clinton said Wednesday to “count the I’s” in Donald Trump’s speeches—and Kamala Harris used the word far less often in her DNC speech than Trump did in his much longer RNC address, though they still mentioned themselves at around the same rate.

Generative AI Can Help You Figure Out Your Last Meal — But Don’t Worry, It’s Just For Fun And Bragging Rights

Last meals are a trending topic. Besides the usual meaning, it is now a hot topic on social media. Turns out that generative AI can help you devise a perfect last meal.

Worries About Baidu Ad Shrinkage Mount Amid Problems Monetizing AI

Chinese search giant Baidu’s core advertising business shrank in the second quarter as the company struggles to monetize its own artificial intelligence technologies.

Meet America’s Best Employers By State 2024

We surveyed more than 160,000 workers across the country to find out which organizations employees recommend the most. Winners range from small firms to large institutions.
